messages.title: The Lib Dem fairer tax plan
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are promising to remove those earning £10,000 or less from the tax system.

messages.title: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives
messages.content: The Conservatives and Labour are both planning to raise VAT as high as 20 per cent

messages.title: It's a two-horse race!
messages.content: Labour can't win in many parts of Britain. The choice is between a Liberal Democrat MP or a Conservative MP. Only the Liberal Democrats will help real change and fairness.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise tax thresholds to £10,000, benefiting four million people and removing the poorest workers out of the tax system.
Promise £100 back in the pockets of pensioners.
Wealthy will pay their fair share - introduce a 'mansion tax' on houses worth over £2 million and close tax loopholes exploited by the very rich.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win in many parts of Britain. The choice is between a Liberal Democrat MP or a Conservative MP.

issues.economy: Raise tax thresholds to benefit four million people
issues.environment: Close tax loopholes exploited by the very rich and make polluters pay.
issues.socialWelfare: Promise £100 back in the pockets of pensioners.

housing.content: Introduce a 'mansion tax' on houses worth over £2 million

leaflet.personalStatement: Fairer taxes that will help our country recover from the recession

quotes.text: The proposal to take the poorest workers out of the tax system is especially worthwhile
The party is also pledging to raise tax thresholds to £10,000 a year, taking four million people out of income tax.
Already hiked taxes for lowest paid workers and pensioners
quotes.source: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives section

quotes.text: Tax cuts just for millionaires with the Conservatives
quotes.source: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives section

quotes.text: The Conservatives and Labour are both planning to raise VAT as high as 20 per cent

images.caption: Fairer taxes that will help our country recover from the recession - Nick Clegg
The Lib Dem fairer tax plan
More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives
Who will deliver the change we need on tax?

leaflet.additionalNotes: If you can earn less than £10,000 a year, £100 back in the pockets of pensioners, £700 back in the pocket of everyone who earns over £10,000, £1,400 back in the pockets of a couple each earning over £10,000.
